00066 #if !defined(PIC_ADC_HCVD_AVAILABLE)
00067 
00068 #asm
00069     #ifndef MTOUCH_ACQ_CAS_INCLUDE
00070     #define MTOUCH_ACQ_CAS_INCLUDE
00071         #if defined(_12F617) && (_HTC_VER_MAJOR_ == 9 && _HTC_VER_MINOR_ == 80)
00072             #include <cas12F617.h>      // HiTech's 9.80 compiler's caspic.h includes the 617 header file twice, causing compiling 
00073                                         // errors. This will by-pass the mistake by directly including the correct file only once.
00074                                         // This issue has been fixed as of the 9.81 release.
00075         #elif (_HTC_VER_MAJOR_ == 9 && _HTC_VER_MINOR_ >= 83)
00076             #if defined(_PIC14) || defined(_PIC14E)
00077             #include <caspic.h>
00078             #endif
00079         #endif
00080     #endif
00081 #endasm
00082 
00088   mTouch_AcquisitionData        mTouch_acqData      [MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS];  
00089   mTouch_AcquisitionData*       mTouch_currentAcqData;  
00090                 uint16_t        mTouch_sensorData   [MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS];    
00091                 uint16_t        mTouch_lastResult;                                      
00092                 uint8_t         mTouch_delayCount;                                      
00093 
00094 #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00095     #if (MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1)
00096                 uint8_t         mTouch_modeIndex; 
00097           const uint8_t*        mTouch_currentScan;
00098     #else
00099                 uint8_t         mTouch_currentScan;
00100     #endif
00101 #endif

00103     #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00104                 uint8_t         mTouch_oversample   [MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS];

00107 #if defined(MTOUCH_JITTER_ENABLE)
00108                 uint8_t         mTouch_jitter = 0x55;

00124 void mTouch_WaitForGoDone       (void);

00136 #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00137     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00138     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode0[MTOUCH_MODE0_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE0_VAR_INIT;
00139     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode1[MTOUCH_MODE1_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE1_VAR_INIT;
00140     #endif
00141     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 2
00142     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode2[MTOUCH_MODE2_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE2_VAR_INIT;
00143     #endif
00144     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 3
00145     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode3[MTOUCH_MODE3_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE3_VAR_INIT;
00146     #endif
00147     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 4
00148     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode4[MTOUCH_MODE4_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE4_VAR_INIT;
00149     #endif
00150     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 5
00151     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode5[MTOUCH_MODE5_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE5_VAR_INIT;
00152     #endif
00153     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 6
00154     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode6[MTOUCH_MODE6_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE6_VAR_INIT;
00155     #endif
00156     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 7
00157     const uint8_t           mTouch_mode7[MTOUCH_MODE7_NUM_SENSORS + 1]  = MTOUCH_MODE7_VAR_INIT;
00158     #endif
00159     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00160     const uint8_t*    const mTouch_mode             [MTOUCH_NUM_MODES]  = MTOUCH_MODE_VAR_INIT;
00161     #endif
00162     
00163     #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00164     const uint8_t   mTouch_Oversample_Default[MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS]  = MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_INIT;
00165     #endif
00166     
00167     void (*const mTouch_ScanA[MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS])(void)             = MTOUCH_SCANA_VAR_INIT;    // Constant array of function pointers
00168     void (*const mTouch_ScanB[MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS])(void)             = MTOUCH_SCANB_VAR_INIT;    // Constant array of function pointers
00169 #endif

00181 #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR)
00182 void interrupt  mTouch_Scan(void)
00183 #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00184 void            mTouch_Scan(void)
00185 #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00186 uint8_t         mTouch_Scan(void)
00187 #endif
00188 {
00189 #asm
00190 mTouch_Scan:
00191 #endasm 
00192         
00193     //
00194     // Intro Logic :: Check to see if we should scan.
00195     //
00196     #if     (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR)
00197         if (MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF == 0) 
00198         {
00199             return;
00200         }  
00201         
00202         MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF = 0; 
00203     #elif   (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00204         if (mTouch_state.scanningEnabled == 0)
00205         {
00206             return 0;
00207         }    
00208     #endif
00209     
00210     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY == MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00211     do
00212     {
00213     #endif
00214     
00215         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE)
00216         if (mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] != 0)
00217         {
00218         #endif
00219     
00220             mTouch_currentAcqData   = &mTouch_acqData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00221             
00222             #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00223             do
00224             {
00225                 mTouch_state.isrServiced = 0;
00226             #endif
00227             
00228                 //
00229                 //  Scan A
00230                 //   
00231                 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00232                 mTouch_ScanA[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]();
00233                 #else
00234                 mTouch_ScanA_0();
00235                 #endif
00236                 
00237                 
00238                 mTouch_WaitForGoDone();
00239                 mTouch_StoreScanA();
00240                 
00241                 //
00242                 // Scan B
00243                 //
00244                 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00245                 mTouch_ScanB[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]();
00246                 #else
00247                 mTouch_ScanB_0();
00248                 #endif
00249                 
00250                 
00251                 mTouch_WaitForGoDone();
00252                 mTouch_StoreScanB();
00253                 
00254                 //
00255                 //  Math
00256                 //
00257                 #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00258                 if (!mTouch_state.isRepeatScan)
00259                 {
00260                 #endif
00261                     mTouch_DecimationFilter();
00262                 #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00263                 }
00264                 #endif
00265                 
00266             #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00267                 mTouch_state.isRepeatScan = mTouch_state.isrServiced;
00268             } while (mTouch_state.isRepeatScan);
00269             #endif
00270         
00271         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE)
00272             mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE]--;
00273         }
00274         #endif
00275         
00276     
00277     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00278         mTouch_currentScan++;
00279     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY == MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00280     } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00281     #else
00282     if  (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE == MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS)
00283     {
00284     #endif
00285     
00286         #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00287         mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00288         #else
00289         mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00290         #endif
00291     #endif  //  end: if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00292     
00293         #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00294         mTouch_delayCount = 0;      // Used as a temporary flag variable
00295         do
00296         {
00297             if (mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE])               // Are there any sensors left to be scanned?
00298                 mTouch_delayCount++;
00299             mTouch_currentScan++;   
00300         } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00301         
00302             #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00303             mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00304             #else
00305             mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00306             #endif
00307         
00308         if (mTouch_delayCount == 0)
00309         {
00310         #else
00311         if (--mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter == 0)
00312         {
00313             mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter   = MTOUCH_SpS_VALUE; 
00314         #endif
00315 
00316             #if (MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1)
00317             do 
00318             {
00319                 mTouch_currentAcqData = &mTouch_acqData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];
00320                 mTouch_sensorData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = (uint16_t)(((uint24_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v) & 0xFFFFF) >> MTOUCH_SCALING_VALUE);
00321                 (*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v &= 0xF00000;
00322                 
00323                 mTouch_currentScan++;    
00324             } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00325             #else
00326                 mTouch_sensorData[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = (uint16_t)(((uint24_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v) & 0xFFFFF) >> MTOUCH_SCALING_VALUE);
00327                 mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v &= 0xF00000;
00328             #endif
00329             
00330             #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00331             mTouch_ChangeMode(mTouch_modeIndex);
00332             #else
00333             mTouch_ChangeMode();
00334             #endif
00335             mTouch_state.dataReady  = 1;
00336         }
00337     
00338     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00339     #if (MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY != MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS)
00340     }
00341     #endif
00342     #endif
00343         
00344     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE) 
00345     if (MTOUCH_JITTER_VALUE != 0)
00346     {
00347     #endif
00348     
00349         #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE) || defined(MTOUCH_JITTER_ENABLE)
00350             #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00351                 JITTER_MAIN_LOOP(); 
00352             #else
00353                 JITTER_START_TIME(); 
00354             #endif
00355         #endif
00356         
00357     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLE)
00358     }
00359     #endif
00360     
00361     #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR) || (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00362     MTOUCH_ISR_TMRxIF = 0;          // Clear TMRxIF to avoid immediate ISR re-entry upon leaving.        
00363     #endif        
00364     
00365     #if (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR) || (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR)
00366         return;
00367     #elif (MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE == MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP)
00368         return mTouch_state.dataReady;
00369     #endif
00370 }
00371 
00372 void mTouch_DecimationFilter(void)
00373 {
00374     // Get the current decimated filter value for the sensor.
00375     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00376     uint16_t    result  = (uint16_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v >> 4);
00377     #else
00378     uint16_t    result  = (uint16_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].result.v >> 4);
00379     #endif
00380     
00381     #if defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00382         #if MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP > 255
00383         uint16_t    decMaxStep  = MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;
00384         #else
00385         uint8_t     decMaxStep  = MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;
00386         #endif
00387         
00388         #undef MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE
00389         #define MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE decMaxStep      // Replace the EEPROM access code with our temporary variable
00390     #endif
00391 
00392     #if defined(MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP) || defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00393         #if (MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_STEP != 0) || defined(MTOUCH_EEPROM_ENABLED)
00394             if ((uint16_t)(mTouch_lastResult) > (uint16_t)(result + MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE))
00395             {                                                                                           
00396                 result += MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;      // Latest conversion is very large. Increment by max step size only.
00397             }                                                                         
00398             else if (result > MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE)                                     
00399             {                                                                               
00400                 if ((uint16_t)(mTouch_lastResult) < result - MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE)  
00401                 {                                                                           
00402                     result -= MTOUCH_DECIMATION_MAX_VALUE;  // Latest conversion is very small. Decrement by max step size only.
00403                 } else {          
00404                     result = mTouch_lastResult;             // Latest conversion is similar in value to decimated value.
00405                 }                                                                               
00406             }                                                                                   
00407             else                                            // Latest conversion is less than (decimated value + STEP_SIZE)
00408             {                                               // AND the decimated value is in danger of underflowing.                               
00409                 result = mTouch_lastResult; 
00410             } 
00411         #else                                           
00412             result = mTouch_lastResult;                     // Decimation disabled.
00413         #endif
00414     #else                                               
00415         result = mTouch_lastResult;                         // Decimation disabled.
00416     #endif
00417  
00418     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00419     (*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v &= 0x000F;            // Store the new decimated value into memory for later use.
00420     (*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v |= (uint16_t)(result << 4);     
00421     #else
00422     mTouch_acqData[0].result.v &= 0x000F;            // Store the new decimated value into memory for later use.
00423     mTouch_acqData[0].result.v |= (uint16_t)(result << 4);     
00424     #endif
00425     
00426     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00427     (*mTouch_currentAcqData).accumulator.v += (uint16_t)((*mTouch_currentAcqData).result.v >> 4);
00428     #else
00429     mTouch_acqData[0].accumulator.v += (uint16_t)(mTouch_acqData[0].result.v >> 4);
00430     #endif
00431 }
00432 
00433 void mTouch_WaitForGoDone(void)
00434 {
00435     mTouch_delayCount = 0xFF;  
00436     while (GO_nDONE && --mTouch_delayCount);  
00437 }
00438 
00439 void mTouch_StoreScanA(void)
00440 {
00441     #if (PIC_ADC_BITS == 8)
00442     mTouch_lastResult = ADRES;
00443     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 10)
00444     mTouch_lastResult = (uint16_t) (ADRESH << 8) + ADRESL;
00445     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 12)
00446     mTouch_lastResult = (uint16_t) (ADRESH << 8) + ADRESL;
00447     #else
00448     #error The PIC_ADC_BITS value in your device's hardware profile is invalid. It must be 8, 10, or 12.
00449     #endif
00450 }
00451 
00452 void mTouch_StoreScanB(void)
00453 {
00454     #if (PIC_ADC_BITS == 8)
00455     mTouch_lastResult = (uint16_t) (ADRES  | 0x0100)                - mTouch_lastResult;
00456     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 10)
00457     mTouch_lastResult = (uint16_t)((ADRESH |   0x04) << 8) + ADRESL - mTouch_lastResult;
00458     #elif (PIC_ADC_BITS == 12)
00459     mTouch_lastResult = (uint16_t)((ADRESH |   0x10) << 8) + ADRESL - mTouch_lastResult;
00460     #else
00461     #error The PIC_ADC_BITS value in your device's hardware profile is invalid. It must be 8, 10, or 12.
00462     #endif
00463 }
00464 
00465 #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00466 void mTouch_ChangeMode(uint8_t newModeIndex)
00467 {
00468 #else
00469 void mTouch_ChangeMode(void)
00470 {
00471 #endif
00472     mTouch_currentAcqData   = 0;
00473     
00474     #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00475     #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00476     if (mTouch_modeIndex != newModeIndex)
00477     {
00478         mTouch_modeIndex            = newModeIndex; 
00479         mTouch_state.justChanged    = 1;
00480 
00481         newModeIndex = 0;
00482         do
00483         {
00484             mTouch_acqData[newModeIndex].accumulator.v &= 0xF00000;
00485             newModeIndex++;
00486         } while (newModeIndex != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00487     }
00488 
00489     mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00490     #else   
00491     mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00492     #endif
00493     #endif
00494     
00495     #if defined(MTOUCH_UNIQUE_OVERSAMPLE_ENABLE) && MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 1
00496     do
00497     {
00498         mTouch_oversample[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE] = mTouch_Oversample_Default[MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE];    
00499         mTouch_currentScan++;   
00500     } while (MTOUCH_CURRENTSCAN_VALUE != MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS);
00501     
00502         #if MTOUCH_NUM_MODES > 1
00503         mTouch_currentScan      = mTouch_mode[mTouch_modeIndex];
00504         #else
00505         mTouch_currentScan      = 0;
00506         #endif
00507         
00508     #else
00509     mTouch_stateVars.sampleCounter   = MTOUCH_SpS_VALUE;
00510     #endif
00511 }

00530 #endif
00531 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 6    
00532 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(6);   
00533 #endif
00534 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 7    
00535 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(7);   
00536 #endif
00537 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 8    
00538 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(8);   
00539 #endif
00540 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 9    
00541 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(9);   
00542 #endif
00543 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 10   
00544 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(10);  
00545 #endif
00546 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 11   
00547 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(11);  
00548 #endif
00549 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 12   
00550 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(12);  
00551 #endif
00552 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 13   
00553 MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTION(13);  
00554 #endif
00555 #if MTOUCH_NUMBER_SENSORS > 14
